column1: #Text=Iroh says : " Where have you been , Prince Zuko ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , how was your trip ?
#Text=" Aang says : " No , I do n't think I did .

#Text=" Main Aang Zuko Antagonists Fire Nation soldiers Yuyan Archers Zhao says : " Minor Appa Herbalist Iroh Jee Katara Momo Shinu Sokka " Zuko says : " The only reason you should be interrupting me , is if you have news about the Avatar .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Well , there is news , Prince Zuko , but you might not like it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle , you taught me that keeping a level head is a sign of a great leader .
#Text=Now , whatever you have to say , I 'm sure I can take it .
#Text=We have no idea where he is .
